abstract: Three members of International Olympic Committee executive board, which decided against blanket ban from 2016 Olympics on Russia for state-sponsored doping scandal, have six days to decide which Russian athletes are allowed to compete in Rio.
lead_paragraph: A panel of three international sports executives will rule on more than 250 Russian athletes cleared by their own federations.

headline.print_headline: Panel to Pick Which Russians Go to Rio
headline.main: I.O.C. Panel to Determine Which Russian Athletes May Compete in Olympics

snippet: A panel of three international sports executives will rule on more than 250 Russian athletes cleared by their own federations....
